00034 
00035         this.controller = controller;

00079     public void setSearchEnabled(Boolean searchEnabled) {
00080         Boolean oldValue = searchEnabled;
00081         this.searchEnabled = searchEnabled;
00082         firePropertyChange("searchEnabled", oldValue, this.searchEnabled);
00083     }

00085     public Boolean isSearchEnabled() {

00100     @Action
00101     public void seriesList() {
00102         //seasonModel.fill(seriesList.getSelectedId());

00104         Series.Data selected = (Series.Data)seriesModel.getSelectedItem();

00107     }

00109     @Action
00110     public void seasonList() {
00111         if ((Season.Data)seasonModel.getSelectedItem() != null) {
00112             setSearchEnabled(true);
00113         } else {
00114             setSearchEnabled(false);
00115         }
